GLSL BLEND LINEAR (JOV_GL) \ud83c\udf08: Simple linear blend between two images
GLSL COLOR CONVERSION (JOV_GL) \ud83c\ud: Convert an image from one color space (RGB, HSV, LAB, XYZ) to another
GLSL COLOR PALETTE (JOV_GL) \ud83c\udf08: Color palette creation using the formula: color(t) = a + b * cos[tau(c*t+d)]
GLSL CONICAL GRADIENT (JOV_GL) \ud83c\ud: Generate a conical gradient from black to white
GLSL DIRECTIONAL WARP (JOV_GL) \ud83c\ud: Domain warp an image with a direction and distortion map
GLSL FILTER RANGE (JOV_GL) \ud83c\udf08: Select pixels from start color through end color
GLSL HSV ADJUST (JOV_GL) \ud83c\udf08: Hue, Saturation and Value adjustment control
GLSL INVERT (JOV_GL) \ud83c\udf08: Invert the channels of an image along a scalar [0
GLSL MIN MAX (JOV_GL) \ud83c\udf08: Gets the minimum and maximum of an image
GLSL NORMAL (JOV_GL) \ud83c\udf08: Convert input into a Normal map
GLSL POSTERIZE (JOV_GL) \ud83c\udf08: Reduce the pixel color data range
GLSL SOBEL (JOV_GL) \ud83c\udf08: Finds the edges of an image
GLSL TRANSFORM (JOV_GL) \ud83c\udf08: Move, Rotate, Scale and Tile an image
